title: 08/03/2021 - HOUR 1 - Brady, Colts, Rodgers

description:
Tom Brady's career is too unbelievable to be a movie

The Colts should consider going after Nick Foles

Packers GM Brian Gutekunst responds to Aaron Rodgers


Guest: Ric Bucher
